#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    int n;
	    cin>>n;
	    int a[n];
	    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
	        cin>>a[i];
	    }
	    sort(a,a+n);
	    int i = 0, j = n-1;
	    while(i<j){
	        cout<<a[j--]<<" "<<a[i++]<<" ";
	    }
	    if(n&1){
	        cout<<a[i]<<endl;
	    }
	}
	return 0;
}
